flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

It is skilled at
slashing enemies
with its claws. If broken, they
start to grow back
in a day.

In an attempt to
hide itself, it
will run around at top speed to
kick up a blinding
dust storm.

If it digs at an
incredible pace,
it may snap off its spikes and
claws. They grow
back in a day.

Adept at climbing
trees, it rolls
into a spiny ball, then attacks its
enemies from
above.

SANDSLASHs body is covered by tough
spikes, which are hardened sections of
its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that
grow out from beneath the old ones.

SANDSLASH can roll up its body as if it
were a ball covered with large spikes.
In battle, this POKMON will try to make the foe flinch by jabbing it with its
spines. It then leaps at the stunned
foe to tear wildly with its sharp claws.

It curls up in a ball to protect itself from
enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent
heatstroke during the daytime when
temperatures rise sharply.

It is adept at attacking with the spines
on its back and its sharp claws while
quickly scurrying about.

Curls up into a spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while curled up
to attack or escape.

It curls up, then rolls into foes
with its back. Its sharp spines
inflict severe damage.

It curls up, then rolls into foes
with its back. Its sharp spines
inflict severe damage.

It curls up, then rolls into foes
with its back. Its sharp spines
inflict severe damage.

In an attempt to hide itself,
it will run around at top speed to
kick up a blinding dust storm.

If it digs at an incredible pace,
it may snap off its spikes and
claws. They grow back in a day.

Il se met en boule pour percuter
lennemi. Ses pines aiguises
font beaucoup de dgts.

It curls up, then rolls into foes
with its back. Its sharp spines
inflict severe damage.

Il se met en boule pour percuter
lennemi. Ses pines aiguises
font beaucoup de dgts.

It curls up, then rolls into foes
with its back. Its sharp spines
inflict severe damage.

The spikes on its body are made
up of its hardened hide. It rolls up
and attacks foes with its spikes.

The spikes on its body are made
up of its hardened hide. It rolls up
and attacks foes with its spikes.

Il creuse si vite quil peut briser ses pines et ses
griffes. Mais elles repoussent en une journe.

Wenn es schnell grbt, knnen seine Stacheln und
Krallen abbrechen. Sie wachsen binnen eines Tages
nach.

Si cava a gran velocidad, puede que se le caigan las
garras y pas. Vuelven a crecerle en un da.

Se scava molto velocemente gli si consumano le
punte e gli artigli, ma gli ricrescono in un giorno.

If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off
its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.

Il se roule en boule hrisse de piques sil est
menac. Il peut ainsi senfuir ou attaquer.

Bei Gefahr igelt sich dieses Pokmon ein.
Zusammengerollt kann es angreifen oder fliehen.

Ante el peligro, se acurruca en un espinoso ovillo.
De esta forma puede rodar para atacar o escapar.

Se in pericolo si chiude a riccio. In questa forma
pu rotolare, attaccare e scappare.

Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can
roll while curled up to attack or escape.

Le corps de Sablaireau est recouvert de pointes trs dures,
qui sont des extensions de sa peau. Une fois par an,
ce Pokmon mue et les vieilles pointes tombent, remplaces
par de nouvelles.

Sandamers Krper ist berst mit spitzen Stacheln,
die eigentlich Hauthrtungen darstellen. Einmal im Jahr
fallen die alten Stacheln aus und werden durch neue ersetzt.

Sandslash est recubierto de duras pas que son partes
endurecidas de la piel. Suele mudarlas una vez al ao; debajo
de las viejas pas crecen unas nuevas que las sustituyen.

Il corpo di Sandslash  ricoperto da aculei coriacei, costituiti
da parti di corazza indurita. I vecchi aculei cadono una volta
allanno per essere sostituiti dai nuovi che crescono sotto
i precedenti.

Sandslashs body is covered by tough spikes, which are
hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes
fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from
beneath the old ones.

Sablaireau peut enrouler son corps pour prendre la forme
dune balle hrisse de pointes. Ce Pokmon essaie de faire
peur  son ennemi en le frappant avec ses pointes.
Puis, il se rue sur lui avec ses griffes acres.

Sandamer kann sich zu einem Ball mit langen Stacheln
zusammenrollen. Im Kampf schlgt es seine Gegner in die
Flucht, indem es sie mit seinen Stacheln sticht. Dann springt
es sie an und schlgt mit seinen scharfen Klauen zu.

Sandslash puede enroscarse y convertirse en una bola de
largas pas. En combate, este Pokmon hace retroceder a
sus rivales clavndoselas. Acto seguido, aprovecha para
echarse sobre ellos y atacarlos con sus afiladas garras.

Sandslash arrotola il proprio corpo come fosse una sfera
ricoperta di grandi aculei, che usa in lotta per far tentennare
il nemico. Poi gli si scaglia contro per colpirlo selvaggiamente
con gli artigli affilati.

Sandslash can roll up its body as if it were a ball covered
with large spikes. In battle, this Pokmon will try to make
the foe flinch by jabbing it with its spines. It then leaps at
the stunned foe to tear wildly with its sharp claws.

Ses griffes et pines sont tranchantes, mais
elles se brisent facilement. Cela dit, il nen a
que faire, puisquelles repoussent le lendemain.

Seine Krallen und Stacheln sind scharf, aber
auch sprde und brechen oft ab. Sie wachsen
jedoch innerhalb eines Tages wieder nach.

No suele inquietarse por el hecho de que sus
afiladas garras y pas se rompan con facilidad,
ya que estas vuelven a crecer al da siguiente.

I suoi artigli e aculei sono molto affilati, ma
anche piuttosto fragili e si spezzano spesso.
Tuttavia, ricrescono nel giro di un giorno.

Although they are sharp, its claws and spikes
often break off. They grow back the next day,
so it is not bothered by the temporary loss.

Il escalade les arbres avec ses griffes. Quand
une proie passe  proximit, il se laisse tomber
dessus toutes pines dresses.

Es erklimmt mit seinen Krallen Bume, rollt sich
ein und wartet, bis Beute erscheint. Dann strzt
es sich als stachelige Kugel auf sie herab.

Trepa a los rboles con sus garras. Cuando
avista una presa, se convierte en una bola de
pas y se deja caer sobre ella.

Si arrampica sugli alberi con gli artigli affilati e,
avvistata la preda, si raggomitola diventando
una sfera irta di aculei e le piomba addosso.

It uses its claws to climb trees and then curls
its body into a spiny ball, ready to drop onto
any prey that appears.

Ses pines et ses griffes se cassent souvent.
Ces pointes brises peuvent servir doutils
pour creuser le sol.

Seine Krallen und Stacheln brechen oft ab. Sie
werden dann zu Werkzeugen fr den Ackerbau
verarbeitet.

Sus garras y pas se caen con frecuencia y
pueden recogerse para elaborar aperos de
labranza.

I suoi aculei si spezzano spesso.
Una volta recuperati, si possono usare per
fabbricare attrezzi per coltivare la terra.

Its claws and horns often break off. The broken
claws and horns can be used to carve plows for
tilling farm fields.

Ses grosses griffes lui permettent de grimper
aux arbres sans peine. Il nest pas rare de voir
un Sablaireau endormi dans les frondaisons.

Mit seinen Krallen kann es gut Bume erklimmen.
Hufig macht es die Baumkrone dann gleich zu
seinem Schlafplatz.

Sus gruesas garras le permiten escalar rboles
con gran agilidad. De hecho, no es extrao ver
ejemplares durmiendo entre el follaje.

Grazie ai suoi grossi artigli pu arrampicarsi
sugli alberi con estrema facilit. Non  raro
vederlo dormire fra i rami.

Thanks to its thick claws, its good at climbing
trees. There are plenty of Sandslash that park
themselves in trees and go right to sleep.

Cette forme est adapte aux tempratures les
plus froides. Lair gel qui schappe de son
corps rend ses pines encore plus acres.

Ses griffes sont redoutables. Si lune delles
se casse en combat, elle repousse en un jour.

Es greift Gegner mit seinen scharfen Klauen an.
Brechen diese im Kampf ab, wachsen sie binnen
eines Tages nach.

Mit dieser Form hat es sich an seine extrem kalte
Umgebung angepasst. Die kalte Luft, die seinem
Krper entstrmt, spitzt seine Eisstacheln.

Esta es la forma que adquiere Sandslash al
adaptarse a un hbitat sumamente fro. El aire
helado que exuda afila las pas de su cuerpo.

Utiliza hbilmente las garras en combate, por
lo que suelen romprsele. Aun as, solo tardan
un da en volverle a crecer.

Si  adattato a vivere in condizioni di freddo
estremo. Dal corpo emette aria gelida con
cui appuntisce i suoi aculei di ghiaccio.

abilissimo a graffiare i nemici con i suoi
artigli affilati. Se si rompono, ricrescono in un
giorno.

It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws.
If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

This is Sandslashs form after adaptation to a
frigid environment. The cold air emitted by its
body sharpens its icy spikes.

Cette forme est adapte aux tempratures les
plus froides. Lair gel qui schappe de son
corps rend ses pines encore plus acres.

Ses griffes sont redoutables. Si lune delles
se casse en combat, elle repousse en un jour.

Es greift Gegner mit seinen scharfen Klauen an.
Brechen diese im Kampf ab, wachsen sie binnen
eines Tages nach.

Mit dieser Form hat es sich an seine extrem kalte
Umgebung angepasst. Die kalte Luft, die seinem
Krper entstrmt, spitzt seine Eisstacheln.

Esta es la forma que adquiere Sandslash al
adaptarse a un hbitat sumamente fro. El aire
helado que exuda afila las pas de su cuerpo.

Utiliza hbilmente las garras en combate, por
lo que suelen romprsele. Aun as, solo tardan
un da en volverle a crecer.

Si  adattato a vivere in condizioni di freddo
estremo. Dal corpo emette aria gelida con
cui appuntisce i suoi aculei di ghiaccio.

abilissimo a graffiare i nemici con i suoi
artigli affilati. Se si rompono, ricrescono in un
giorno.

It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws.
If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

This is Sandslashs form after adaptation to a
frigid environment. The cold air emitted by its
body sharpens its icy spikes.

Il court en se frayant un passage dans la neige
de ses grandes griffes. Sur les monts enneigs,
aucun Pokmon ne surpasse sa vitesse.

Plus son habitat est sec, plus ses pines
dorsales deviennent dures et lisses.

Je trockener das Gebiet ist, in dem Sandamer
lebt, desto hrter und glatter fhlen sich die
Stacheln an seinem Rcken an.

Mit seinen groen Krallen grbt es sich flink
durch den Schnee. In verschneiten Gebirgen
ist es schneller als jedes andere Pokmon.

Cuanto ms seco es el terreno en el que habita,
ms duras y lisas se vuelven las pas que le
recubren la espalda.

Sus enormes garras le permiten abrirse camino
por la nieve que cubre su hbitat y recorrerlo a
mayor velocidad que ningn otro Pokmon.

Corre piantando saldamente nella neve i suoi
grandi artigli. Ci lo rende il Pokmon pi veloce
sui monti innevati.

Pi secco  il territorio dove Sandslash vive,
pi i suoi aculei dorsali diventano lisci e duri.

It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through
deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this
Sandslash is faster than any other Pokmon.

The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder
and smoother the Pokmons spikes will feel
when touched.

Il grimpe aux arbres grce  ses griffes acres
et fait tomber des Baies pour les Sabelette
qui attendent au sol.

Nombreux sont ceux qui escaladent les monts
enneigs pour admirer les reflets du soleil levant
dans ses pines de glace.

Mit seinen scharfen Krallen klettert es auf Bume
und wirft unten wartenden Sandan Beeren zu,
die sie sich dann teilen.

Viele Menschen erklimmen verschneite Berge
in der Hoffnung, die Eisstacheln dieser Pokmon
in der Morgensonne glitzern zu sehen.

Mucha gente escala las montaas solo para
poder admirar el hermoso brillo que despiden
sus pas de hielo baadas por el sol matutino.

Trepa a los rboles con sus afiladas garras y deja
caer bayas para los Sandshrew que esperan
debajo.

Molti appassionati scalano le montagne innevate
in cui vive per ammirare lo splendore dei suoi
aculei di ghiaccio illuminati dal sole del mattino.

Si arrampica sugli alberi utilizzando i suoi artigli
affilati per poi condividere le bacche che trova
con i Sandshrew, che aspettano sotto.

It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws.
Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping
them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

Many people climb snowy mountains, hoping to
see the icy spikes of these Pokmon glistening
in the light of dawn.
